column4: Thank You!  I have been dreaming of "Open in Terminal" in Nautilus forever.  Thanks :)
your welcome. i would also recommend installing    nautilus-gksu   then you can right click on a file like  xorg.conf that needs root priveleges to edit and choose  Open as Administrator
clonezilla is doing a byte by byte copy (NOT a filesystem copy), thus the filesystem is more or less irrelevant
